lection-8hg.title: Introduction To Quantum Annealers
lection-8hg.description: ...But what exactly are quantum computers? How do they work? These questions and more will be answered in this introductory lection!

lesson-75N.title: The inner workings of quantum annealers

lection-fC9.title: The N Queens Problem
lection-fC9.description: The search for optimal chess positions  — still complex for many of today's computers. But also for quantum physics?

lesson-uFZ.title: Introduction to the N queens problem

lesson-qhs.title: From coefficients to the Hamiltonian matrix

lesson-nAh.title: Bonus: Another perspective on the cost function

lection-chj.title: The Traveling Salesman Problem
lection-chj.description: Always find the best route — is that also possible with quantum computers as a navigation system? Find out in this lection!

lesson-wgr.title: Introduction to the traveling salesman problem

lesson-Bgf.title: Transforming the problem for quantum annealers

lection-BiE.title: Solving Sudoku Riddles
lection-BiE.description: Everyone recognizes them: The magic number tables from Japan. Do they also manage to challenge the brains of quantum anealers?

lesson-2D9.title: Introduction to the principles of Sudoku

lesson-A3P.title: QUBO equation: Naive vs. optimized formulation
